item.title: 2023 AMC 8 Problem 23 Solution
item.description: Each square in a $3 \times 3$ grid is randomly filled with one of the $4$ gray and white tiles. What is the probability that the tiling will contain a large gray diamond in one of the smaller $2 \times 2$ grids?
